H0.text: Which Russian author died at Astapovo Railway Station in 1910 of pneumonia. Fyodor Dostoevsky

H1.text: Which Russian author died at Astapovo Railway Station in 1910 of pneumonia. Vladimir Nabokov

H2.text: Which Russian author died at Astapovo Railway Station in 1910 of pneumonia. Mikhail Bulgakov

H3.text: Which Russian author died at Astapovo Railway Station in 1910 of pneumonia. Tolstoy

A4.text: Tolstoy died on 20 November 1910 at the age of 82 of pneumonia, at Astapovo railway station
